segments.text: The kitchen is a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, drying a stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she see the water flooding out of the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over, ruining everything in its path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is soaked, and she's wading in it like it's nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is risking his neck on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's digging into the cookie jar without a thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is helping him, reaching up like it's all a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, stealing cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence is infuriating; someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be a nightmare to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden outside can't make up for this indoor disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
